segments.text: Hey , Jim , it ’ s time to wake up and get out of bed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do I have to get up now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ d better get up , or you ’ ll be late .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you talking about ? My alarm hasn ’ t even gone off yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it did . It went off 30 minutes ago . You slept right through it . You ’ re like a dead person while you sleep .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I must have slept right through it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just let me sleep 5 more minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The early bird gets the worm .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . I know . But I don ’ t want any worms .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ha ! Ha ! If you don ’ t make an effort now , later on it ’ ll be a lot tougher for you .
segments.speaker: S1
